title: Iván Daniel Rodríguez Cruz
text: Bachelor in Statistics from the University of Costa Rica (UCR), with graduation scheduled for February 2025. Currently, I perform research roles in two academic institutions: Junior Researcher at the Anker Research Institute and Research Assistant at the Institute of Social Research of the UCR. My research interests include inequality and poverty studies, wage studies, applied multivariate statistics for the social sciences, and data science.
